JUDGES: Anatoly Kovler;Julia Laffranque;Khanlar Hajiyev;Linos-Alexandre Sicilianos;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Peer Lorenzen
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lived in GPE , LOC .

CARDINAL . By a judgment of DATE the Vetluga ORG of ORG ( “ the ORG ” ) granted in part the applicant ’s claim for recovery of unpaid military allowance and awarded him MONEY ( RUB ) to be recovered from military unit ORG .

CARDINAL . The judgment became final on DATE and shortly thereafter the applicant obtained a writ of execution . DATE and DATE the Departments of ORG of GPE and of GPE returned the enforcement documents to the applicant on QUANTITY occasions without enforcement due to his failure to submit his bank account details and then due to re - organisation of the debtor .
CARDINAL . By a decision of DATE ORG allowed the applicant ’s request and changed the method and order of enforcement of the judgment of DATE , replacing the defunct debtor with ORG of GPE .

CARDINAL . The applicant forwarded the writ of execution concerning the decision of DATE to the head office of the bailiffs’ service in GPE in DATE . It appears from the correspondence and the applicant ’s submissions that the writ was subsequently lost .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant died .
CARDINAL . By a decision of DATE ORG ruled that the deceased applicant was to be succeeded by his mother , PERSON .

CARDINAL . According to PERSON , in DATE she was contacted by a representative of ORG who explained to her that she was to obtain a copy of the lost writ of execution at the trial court and forward it to the authorities to enable further enforcement proceedings .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of ORG informed that the debtor was ready to pay the due amount provided that they received the pertinent documents , including the writ of execution .

CARDINAL . The Government submitted that the applicant ’s mother had refused to obtain a copy of the writ of execution from the trial court despite the LOC repeated invitations thereto , convinced that the award could be obtained only through the proceedings at ORG . PERSON did not dispute this allegation .
CARDINAL . The judgment of DATE , as amended on DATE , remains unenforced to date .
